statements: DELETE FROM student_reports WHERE student_id = 1001 AND enrollment_status = 'Active';
DELETE FROM student_reports WHERE enrollment_status = 'Inactive' AND (engagement_level = 'Low' OR engagement_level = 'Medium');
DELETE FROM grades WHERE student_id = 123 AND course_code = 'Math101';
DELETE FROM students WHERE student_id = 1001 AND enrollment_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM grades WHERE student_id = 1002 AND course_code = 'MATH101' AND semester = 'Fall';
DELETE FROM grades WHERE student_id IN (SELECT student_id FROM students WHERE enrollment_date < '2020-01-01');
DELETE FROM Enrollment WHERE student_id = 1 AND course_id = 101;
DELETE FROM Engagement WHERE student_id = 1 AND course_id = 101;
DELETE FROM Performance WHERE student_id = 1 AND course_id = 101;
DELETE FROM Enrollment WHERE student_id = 123 AND course_id = 456
DELETE FROM Engagement WHERE engagement_score < 50 AND engagement_date < '2021-09-01'
DELETE FROM engagements WHERE engagement_date < '2022-01-01' AND engagement_type = 'Homework';
